DOC.brief_summary: The propose study test efficacy HMB free acid gel decrease muscle damage , diminish inflammatory response , improve muscle strength recovery follow acute exercise stress . HMB free acid gel CaHMB capsule form administer either single dose bout acute exercise multiple dos ( one three daily dose 4 day follow acute exercise ) . We hypothesize HMB free acid gel result less muscle damage , diminish inflammatory response , improve muscle strength recovery either placebo CaHMB treatment follow bout acute eccentric exercise . Our endpoint include measurement : ( 1 ) marker muscle damage ( CPK LDH ) ; ( 2 ) indicator inflammation ( CRP , TNF-Î± , IL-6 , IL-1ra IL-18 ) ; ( 3 ) muscle strength recovery soreness .
DOC.criteria: Must live within 50 mile Ames , Iowa Free cardiac , liver , pulmonary , kidney disease Free chronic inflammatory disease include rheumatoid arthritis , osteoarthritis , inflammatory bowel disease , psoriasis Free diabetes mellitus Not classify morbidly obese ( BMI must less 40 ) Free cardiac , liver , pulmonary , kidney disease No serious medical illness Normal menstrual cycle pregnant lactate Able consume supplement perform require exercise test Live 50 mile Ames , Iowa Presence cardiac , liver , pulmonary , kidney disease Presence chronic inflammatory disease include rheumatoid arthritis , osteoarthritis , inflammatory bowel disease , psoriasis Diabetes mellitus Classified morbidly obese ( BMI great 40 ) No serious medical illness Abnormal menstrual cycle , pregnant lactate Not able consume supplement perform require exercise test
